<!-- DO NOT EDIT! This file was auto-generated by crates/build/re_types_builder/src/codegen/docs/mod.rs -->

The innermost datatype of an image.

How individual color channel components are encoded.

## Variants
* `U8` = 6
* `I8` = 7
* `U16` = 8
* `I16` = 9
* `U32` = 10
* `I32` = 11
* `U64` = 12
* `I64` = 13
* `F16` = 33
* `F32` = 34
* `F64` = 35

## Arrow datatype
```
uint8
```
